contentrichtext.text: '''EUA''' can stand for: *The councils in the [[European Union]] **EU emission allowance (EUA), see [[European Union Emission Trading Scheme]] **[[European Unit of Account]] **[[European University Association]] *[[United States of America]], EUA in [[Spanish language in the United States|Spanish]] (''Estados Unidos de América''), [[French language|French]] (''États-Unis d'Amérique'') and [[Portuguese language|Portuguese]] (''Estados Unidos da América'') *[[Emergency Use Authorization]], in the United States, a means for the Food and Drug Administration to approve new drugs or new indications for previously approved drugs during a declared emergency *[[EULA|End user agreement]] *Examination under [[anesthesia]] ''(medical contexts)'' *The IOC code currently applied for the Olympic [[United Team of Germany]] of 1956-1964 ==See also== *[[Eua]] *[[Eua, Argolis]], Greece *[[Eua (Tonga)]] *[[EULA]] {{disambig}}
